title: Intense 951 series makes Sniper and Primer carbon frames heaps more affordable
content:
Intense Cycles have created a new arm of the brand aimed at riders who are new to mountain biking. The Intense 951 Series is a more affordable run of the Sniper XC bike and the Primer Trail bike, carrying the very same carbon frames but with a spec list to match the reduced prices. The [â€¦]

The post Intense 951 series makes Sniper and Primer carbon frames heaps more affordable appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
